name: Pechka: Historical Story Adventure
description:
In the early 20th century, the citizens of a vanished country started to fight. And at the center of it all is the young man ‘ Pyotr', who has chosen no nation.

Experience a story set against real history and become the protagonist yourself!
You can experience a sad story that unfolds amidst the tragic history of war.

Immersive Story

"Pechka" is a story centered around the journey of the young man 'Pyotr' and the struggles and conflicts of the vanished country's citizens. Immerse yourself in the drama unfolding amidst the tragic history of war.

Meticulously Verified Historical Facts and Authentic Sources

From World War I to the Bolshevik Revolution to Korea's independence movement, the game is set in the Russian Far East in the early 20th century, offering a thorough historical and period authenticity to provide players with a realistic experience.

Betrayal, Death, and Love

"Pechka" explores various emotions and themes such as betrayal, death, and love. Through this, players will empathize with the choices and struggles of the characters as they experience a range of emotions throughout the story.

Intimacy System and Multiple Endings

Pay close attention to the intimacy levels with the characters, which change based on the player's choices and actions. These interactions will lead to various endings. Discover the impact of this era's tragedy through your own choices.

Small Stories

The game progresses by unraveling small stories that contribute to the completion of the overall narrative. Players immerse themselves in this turbulent era by exploring and making choices within these tales.

Adorable Cats

Cute cats make appearances in the game, adding joy to the gaming world.
Discover various cats that appear throughout the game.
